trans-unit.source: Warning: Enabling the "share customers" and "share orders" options is not recommended. Once activated and orders are created, you will not be able to disable these options. If you need these options, we recommend using several categories rather than several shops.
trans-unit.target: Warning: Enabling the "share customers" and "share orders" options is not recommended. Once activated and orders are created, you will not be able to disable these options. If you need these options, we recommend using several categories rather than several shops.

trans-unit.source: Once this option is enabled, the shops in this group will share customers. If a customer registers in any one of these shops, the account will automatically be available in the others shops of this group.
trans-unit.target: Once this option is enabled, the shops in this group will share customers. If a customer registers in any one of these shops, the account will automatically be available in the others shops of this group.

trans-unit.source: Warning: you will not be able to disable this option once you have registered customers.
trans-unit.target: Warning: you will not be able to disable this option once you have registered customers.

trans-unit.source: Once this option is enabled (which is only possible if customers and available quantities are shared among shops), the customer's cart will be shared by all shops in this group. This way, any purchase started in one shop will be able to be completed in another shop from the same group.
trans-unit.target: Once this option is enabled (which is only possible if customers and available quantities are shared among shops), the customer's cart will be shared by all shops in this group. This way, any purchase started in one shop will be able to be completed in another shop from the same group.

trans-unit.source: Warning: You will not be able to disable this option once you've started to accept orders.
trans-unit.target: Warning: You will not be able to disable this option once you've started to accept orders.

trans-unit.source: Enable or disable this shop group?
trans-unit.target: Enable or disable this shop group?

trans-unit.source: If you want to add a virtual URL, you need to activate URL rewriting on your web server and enable Friendly URL option.
trans-unit.target: If you want to add a virtual URL, you need to activate URL rewriting on your web server and enable Friendly URL option.

trans-unit.source: You can use this option if you want to create a store with a URL that doesn't exist on your server (e.g. if you want your store to be available with the URL www.example.com/my-store/shoes/, you have to set shoes/ in this field, assuming that my-store/ is your Physical URL).
trans-unit.target: You can use this option if you want to create a store with a URL that doesn't exist on your server (e.g. if you want your store to be available with the URL www.example.com/my-store/shoes/, you have to set shoes/ in this field, assuming that my-store/ is your Physical URL).

trans-unit.source: URL rewriting must be activated on your server to use this feature.
trans-unit.target: URL rewriting must be activated on your server to use this feature.

trans-unit.source: If you set this URL as the Main URL for the selected shop, all URLs set to this shop will be redirected to this URL (you can only have one Main URL per shop).
trans-unit.target: If you set this URL as the Main URL for the selected shop, all URLs set to this shop will be redirected to this URL (you can only have one Main URL per shop).

trans-unit.source: Since the selected shop has no main URL, you have to set this URL as the Main URL.
trans-unit.target: Since the selected shop has no main URL, you have to set this URL as the Main URL.

trans-unit.source: The selected shop already has a Main URL. Therefore, if you set this one as the Main URL, the older Main URL will be set as a regular URL.
trans-unit.target: The selected shop already has a Main URL. Therefore, if you set this one as the Main URL, the older Main URL will be set as a regular URL.

trans-unit.source: This is the physical folder for your store on the web server. Leave this field empty if your store is installed on the root path. For instance, if your store is available at www.example.com/my-store/, you must input my-store/ in this field.
trans-unit.target: This is the physical folder for your store on the web server. Leave this field empty if your store is installed on the root path. For instance, if your store is available at www.example.com/my-store/, you must input my-store/ in this field.

trans-unit.source: Warning: URL rewriting (e.g. mod_rewrite for Apache) seems to be disabled. If your Virtual URL doesn't work, please check with your hosting provider on how to activate URL rewriting.
trans-unit.target: Warning: URL rewriting (e.g. mod_rewrite for Apache) seems to be disabled. If your Virtual URL doesn't work, please check with your hosting provider on how to activate URL rewriting.

trans-unit.source: Enable or disable debug mode. Debug mode will enable extended error reporting, display the Symfony debug bar, and other features.
trans-unit.target: Enable or disable debug mode. Debug mode will enable extended error reporting, display the Symfony debug bar, and other features.

trans-unit.target: Enable or disable debug profiling. Debug profiling will display performance-related information under each page and help find performance bottlenecks in your store.

trans-unit.target: Check the IP address of the cookie in order to prevent your cookie from being stolen.

trans-unit.source: Set the amount of hours during which the front office cookies are valid. After that amount of time, the customer will have to log in again.
trans-unit.target: Set the amount of hours during which the front office cookies are valid. After that amount of time, the customer will have to log in again.

trans-unit.source: When you access your back office and decide to stay logged in, your cookies lifetime defines your browser session. Set here the number of hours during which you want them valid before logging in again.
trans-unit.target: When you access your back office and decide to stay logged in, your cookies lifetime defines your browser session. Set here the number of hours during which you want them valid before logging in again.

trans-unit.target: Check that URL rewriting is available on this server.

trans-unit.source: Check that the six methods GET, POST, PUT, PATCH, DELETE and HEAD are supported by this server.
trans-unit.target: Check that the six methods GET, POST, PUT, PATCH, DELETE and HEAD are supported by this server.

trans-unit.source: Before choosing "Yes", check that PHP is not configured as an Apache module on your server.
trans-unit.target: Before choosing "Yes", check that PHP is not configured as an Apache module on your server.

trans-unit.source: Quick description of the key: who it is for, what permissions it has, etc.

trans-unit.source: How to restore a database backup in 10 easy steps
trans-unit.target: How to restore a database backup in 10 easy steps

trans-unit.source: Set "Enable Shop" to "No" in the "Maintenance" page under the "Preferences" menu.
trans-unit.target: Set "Enable Shop" to "No" in the "Maintenance" page under the "Preferences" menu.

trans-unit.source: Download the backup from the list below or from your FTP server (in the folder "admin/backups").
trans-unit.target: Download the backup from the list below or from your FTP server (in the folder "admin/backups").

trans-unit.source: Check the backup integrity: Look for errors, incomplete file, etc... Be sure to verify all of your data.
trans-unit.target: Check the backup integrity: Look for errors, incomplete file, etc... Be sure to verify all of your data.

trans-unit.source: Please ask your hosting provider for "phpMyAdmin" access to your database.
trans-unit.target: Please ask your hosting provider for "phpMyAdmin" access to your database.

trans-unit.source: Connect to "phpMyAdmin" and select your current database.
trans-unit.target: Connect to "phpMyAdmin" and select your current database.

trans-unit.source: Unless you enabled the "Drop existing tables" option, you must delete all tables from your current database.
trans-unit.target: Unless you enabled the "Drop existing tables" option, you must delete all tables from your current database.

trans-unit.source: At the top of the screen, please select the "Import" tab
trans-unit.target: At the top of the screen, please select the "Import" tab

trans-unit.source: Click on the "%phpmyadmin_browse_label%" button and select the backup file from your hard drive.
trans-unit.target: Click on the "%phpmyadmin_browse_label%" button and select the backup file from your hard drive.

trans-unit.source: Check the maximum filesize allowed (e.g. Max: 16MB)
trans-unit.target: Check the maximum filesize allowed (e.g. Max: 16MB)

trans-unit.source: If your backup file exceeds this limit, contact your hosting provider for assistance.
trans-unit.target: If your backup file exceeds this limit, contact your hosting provider for assistance.

trans-unit.source: Click on the "%phpmyadmin_go_label%" button and please wait patiently for the import process to conclude. This may take several minutes.
trans-unit.target: Click on the "%phpmyadmin_go_label%" button and please wait patiently for the import process to conclude. This may take several minutes.

trans-unit.source: You can read information on import at:
trans-unit.target: You can read information on import at:

trans-unit.source: https://docs.prestashop-project.org/1.7-documentation/user-guide/configuring-shop/advanced-parameters/import
trans-unit.target: https://docs.prestashop-project.org/1.7-documentation/user-guide/configuring-shop/advanced-parameters/import

trans-unit.source: Read more about the CSV format at:
trans-unit.target: Read more about the CSV format at:

trans-unit.source: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Comma-separated_values
trans-unit.target: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Comma-separated_values

trans-unit.source: Allowed formats: .csv, .xls, .xlsx, .xlst, .ods, .ots
trans-unit.target: Allowed formats: .csv, .xls, .xlsx, .xlst, .ods, .ots

trans-unit.source: Only UTF-8 and ISO 8859-1 encodings are allowed
trans-unit.target: Only UTF-8 and ISO 8859-1 encodings are allowed

trans-unit.source: You can also upload your file via FTP to the following directory: %s .
trans-unit.target: You can also upload your file via FTP to the following directory: %s .

trans-unit.source: https://docs.prestashop-project.org/v.8-documentation/user-guide/configuring-shop/advanced-parameters/import
trans-unit.target: https://docs.prestashop-project.org/v.8-documentation/user-guide/configuring-shop/advanced-parameters/import

trans-unit.source: Fill in the fields below to set up DKIM signing of outgoing emails. This will reduce the likelihood of your emails being marked as spam. You can get the data below from your server administrator or generate it yourself by using one of the freely available tools, such as dkimcore.org. Also, make sure that your server is registered as an authorized sender in your SPF record.
trans-unit.target: Fill in the fields below to set up DKIM signing of outgoing emails. This will reduce the likelihood of your emails being marked as spam. You can get the data below from your server administrator or generate it yourself by using one of the freely available tools, such as dkimcore.org. Also, make sure that your server is registered as an authorized sender in your SPF record.

trans-unit.source: How do I create a new SQL query?
trans-unit.target: How do I create a new SQL query?

trans-unit.source: Click "%add_new_label%".
trans-unit.target: Click "%add_new_label%".

trans-unit.source: Fill in the fields and click "%save_label%".
trans-unit.target: Fill in the fields and click "%save_label%".

trans-unit.source: You can then view the query results by clicking on the "%view_label%" action in the dropdown menu
trans-unit.target: You can then view the query results by clicking on the "%view_label%" action in the dropdown menu

trans-unit.source: You can also export the query results as a CSV file by clicking on the "%export_label%" button
trans-unit.target: You can also export the query results as a CSV file by clicking on the "%export_label%" button
trans-unit.note: Line: 37 Comment: Recommended modules will be attached to here.

trans-unit.source: All outdated sessions will be automatically cleared after the first connection attempt, but you can do it manually now if needed.
trans-unit.target: All outdated sessions will be automatically cleared after the first connection attempt, but you can do it manually now if needed.

trans-unit.source: Scores are integers from 0 to 4.
trans-unit.target: Scores are integers from 0 to 4.

trans-unit.source: Notifications are numbered bubbles displayed at the very top of your back office, right next to the shop's name. They display the number of new items since you last clicked on them.
trans-unit.target: Notifications are numbered bubbles displayed at the very top of your back office, right next to the shop's name. They display the number of new items since you last clicked on them.

trans-unit.source: This feature allows you to identify modules that might be causing bugs on your store. Disable all non-built-in modules (not listed in composer.json). Then, re-enable each module one by one and check that everything works properly before moving on to the next one.
trans-unit.target: This feature allows you to identify modules that might be causing bugs on your store. Disable all non-built-in modules (not listed in composer.json). Then, re-enable each module one by one and check that everything works properly before moving on to the next one.

trans-unit.source: Some features can be disabled in order to improve performance.
trans-unit.target: Some features can be disabled in order to improve performance.

trans-unit.source: CCC allows you to reduce the loading time of your page. With these settings you will gain performance without even touching the code of your theme. Make sure, however, that your theme is compatible with PrestaShop 1.7+. Otherwise, CCC will cause problems.
trans-unit.target: CCC allows you to reduce the loading time of your page. With these settings you will gain performance without even touching the code of your theme. Make sure, however, that your theme is compatible with PrestaShop 1.7+. Otherwise, CCC will cause problems.

trans-unit.target: Invalid

trans-unit.source: Okay
trans-unit.target: Okay

trans-unit.source: Good
trans-unit.target: Good

trans-unit.source: Fabulous
trans-unit.target: Fabulous
